timeline.bodyText: Please, we are used to use the Logger - https://github.com/jbosstm/narayana/blob/master/ArjunaJTA/jta/classes/com/arjuna/ats/jta/logging/jtaI18NLogger.java#L50 to report the WARN and ERROR messages. We expect that e.g. the messages could be translated and tracked by id. Could you please make the message being defined there?
timeline.author: ochaloup

timeline.bodyText: It could be better to use zero size array for toArray (toArray(new T[0])), see https://shipilev.net/blog/2016/arrays-wisdom-ancients/#_conclusion
timeline.author: ochaloup

timeline.bodyText: A topic for discussion - would make sense to check for null the format and branch as well? Is there some experience that e.g. Oracle could not be filling the other parts of Xid and leaving them null?
timeline.author: ochaloup

replies.bodyText: I added check for branch == null.
replies.author: ivassile

timeline.bodyText: A code style thing (not necessary to be addressed) - maybe the debug call message could be whole at single line.
timeline.author: ochaloup

timeline.bodyText: If there is the check for globalTransactionId and branchQualifier in this printing, it could be good to check the format for null as well here.
timeline.author: ochaloup

timeline.bodyText: Would not be good to rename the arg0 to something more readable, e.g. xaResourceAsString?
timeline.author: ochaloup

timeline.bodyText: It seems a strange indent is used here.
timeline.author: ochaloup
